structure.unit: DIVISION 3. SIGN STANDARDS REQUIREMENTS AND CHARTS

law.catch_line: Permanent point of sale signs in the BU and IU Districts.

text.section:
Sec. 33-106. Permanent point of sale signs in the BU and IU Districts.
Type of signs permitted: Detached; marquee; flat; awning, canopy, roller curtain, umbrella; projecting; pylon. (Not applicable to shopping centers; see definition for shopping centers.)
